General.Name: Four Arrows Capital Corp
General.Description: Four Arrows Capital Corp. does not have significant operations. It intends to identify and evaluate businesses and assets with a view to complete a qualifying transaction. The company was incorporated in 2019 and is headquartered in North Vancouver, Canada.
